languages.text: "Как ты и сказал, Алайток — мир моих собратьев-изгоев. Они не станут вредить мне нарочно, и это окрыляет душу надеждой. Посмотри мне в глаза, Шайрэнкхей. Хочешь ли ты прекратить страдания наших собратьев? Я вижу ответ в твоем сердце. Ты должен принять его и помочь мне". {n}Пусть слова Ирлиэт и обращены к собрату, ее глаза внимательно следят за вашей реакцией.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Как ты и сказал, Алайток — мир моих собратьев-изгоев. Они не станут вредить мне нарочно, и это окрыляет душу надеждой. Посмотри мне в глаза, Шайрэнкхей. Хочешь ли ты прекратить страдания наших собратьев? Я вижу ответ в твоем сердце. Ты должен принять его и помочь мне". {n}Пусть слова Ирлиэт и обращены к собрату, ее глаза внимательно следят за вашей реакцией.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "As you said, Alaitoc is a world of my fellow Outcasts. They would not wish harm upon me, which gives wings to my hope. Look me in the eye, Shairenkhei. Do you wish to end the suffering of our kin? I can see the answer in your heart. You must accept it and help me." {n}Though Yrliet's words are addressed to her kinsman, she is watching your reaction closely.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Как ты и сказал, Алайток — мир моих собратьев-изгоев. Они не станут вредить мне нарочно, и это окрыляет душу надеждой. Посмотри мне в глаза, Шайрэнкхей. Хочешь ли ты прекратить страдания наших собратьев? Я вижу ответ в твоем сердце. Ты должен принять его и помочь мне". {n}Пусть слова Ирлиэт и обращены к собрату, ее глаза внимательно следят за вашей реакцией.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Like you said, Alaitoc is a world of my fellow Exiles. They are not going to hurt me on purpose, and this is giving wings to my hope. Look me in the eye, Shairenkhei. Do you wish to end the suffering of our kinsmen? I can see the reply in your heart. You must accept it and aid me." {n}Though Yrliet's words are addressed to her brother, she is watching your reaction closely.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Like you said, Alaitoc is a world of my fellow Exiles. They are not going to hurt me on purpose, and this is giving wings to my hope. Look me in the eye, Shairenkhei. Do you wish to end the suffering of our kinsmen? I can see the reply in your heart. You must accept it and aid me." {n}Though Yrliet's words are addressed to her brother, she is watching your reaction closely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "As you said, Alaitoc is a world of my fellow Outcasts. They would not wish harm upon me, which gives wings to my hope. Look me in the eye, Shairenkhei. Do you wish to end the suffering of our kin? I can see the answer in your heart. You must accept it and help me." {n}Though Yrliet's words are addressed to her kinsman, she is watching your reaction closely.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Como tú has dicho, Alaitoc es un mundo de camaradas proscritos. Ellos no me harán daño, y esto no hace sino reforzar mis esperanzas. Mírame a los ojos, Shairenkhei. ¿No deseas poner fin al sufrimiento de los nuestros? Veo la respuesta en tu corazón. Debes aceptarlo y ayudarme». {n}Aunque Yrliet se ha dirigido a sus congéneres, es tu reacción la que observa detenidamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As you said, Alaitoc is a world of my fellow Outcasts. They would not wish harm upon me, which gives wings to my hope. Look me in the eye, Shairenkhei. Do you wish to end the suffering of our kin? I can see the answer in your heart. You must accept it and help me." {n}Though Yrliet's words are addressed to her kinsman, she is watching your reaction closely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Como tú has dicho, Alaitoc es un mundo de camaradas proscritos. Ellos no me harán daño a sabiendas, y esto no hace sino reforzar mis esperanzas. Mírame a los ojos, Shairenkhei. ¿No deseas poner fin al sufrimiento de los nuestros? Veo la respuesta en tu corazón. Debes aceptarlo y ayudarme». {n}Aunque Yrliet se ha dirigido a sus congéneres, es tu reacción la que observa detenidamente.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “如你所言，阿莱托克是我的流浪者同胞的世界。他们不会有意伤害我，这给我带来了希望。看着我的眼睛，榭伦凯。你想结束我们同胞的痛苦吗？我能看到你内心的回应。你必须接受你心中的回应，帮助我。”{n}尽管伊莉耶特这些话是说给她的亲族的，但她也在密切关注你的反应。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As you said, Alaitoc is a world of my fellow Outcasts. They would not wish harm upon me, which gives wings to my hope. Look me in the eye, Shairenkhei. Do you wish to end the suffering of our kin? I can see the answer in your heart. You must accept it and help me." {n}Though Yrliet's words are addressed to her kinsman, she is watching your reaction closely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如你所言，阿莱托克是我的流浪者同胞的世界。他们不会有意伤害我，这给我带来了希望。看着我的眼睛，榭伦凯。你想结束我们同胞的痛苦吗？我能看到你内心的回应。你必须接受你心中的回应，帮助我。”{n}尽管伊莉耶特这些话是说给她的亲族的，但她也在密切关注你的反应。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Comme vous l'avez dit, Alaitoc est peuplé d'Errants comme moi. Ils ne voudraient pas me faire mal volontairement et c'est ce qui me donne de l'espoir. Regardez-moi dans les yeux, Shairenkhei. Souhaitez-vous mettre fin à la souffrance de nos semblables ? Je vois la réponse de votre cœur. Vous devez l'accepter et m'aider. » {n}Bien que les paroles d'Yrliet s'adressent à Shairenkhei, elle observe attentivement votre réaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As you said, Alaitoc is a world of my fellow Outcasts. They would not wish harm upon me, which gives wings to my hope. Look me in the eye, Shairenkhei. Do you wish to end the suffering of our kin? I can see the answer in your heart. You must accept it and help me." {n}Though Yrliet's words are addressed to her kinsman, she is watching your reaction closely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous l'avez dit, Alaitoc est peuplé d'Errants comme moi. Je sais qu'ils ne me feront aucun mal volontairement et c'est ce qui me donne de l'espoir. Regardez-moi dans les yeux, Shairenkhei. Souhaitez-vous mettre fin à la souffrance de nos semblables ? Je vois la réponse de votre cœur. Vous devez l'accepter et m'aider. » {n}Bien que les paroles d'Yrliet s'adressent à Shairenkhei, elle observe attentivement votre réaction.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたが言ったように、アライトクは追放者の仲間たちの世界だ。彼らは幸い、私に危害を加えることは望まない。この事実は私の希望に翼を与えてくれる。私の目を見ろ、シャイレンケイ。我々の同胞の苦しみを終わらせたいか？あなたの心の中に答えが見える。それを受け入れて、私を助けてくれないか」{n}ユリエットの言葉は同族に向けられたものだが、彼女はあなたの反応を注意深く見ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As you said, Alaitoc is a world of my fellow Outcasts. They would not wish harm upon me, which gives wings to my hope. Look me in the eye, Shairenkhei. Do you wish to end the suffering of our kin? I can see the answer in your heart. You must accept it and help me." {n}Though Yrliet's words are addressed to her kinsman, she is watching your reaction closely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが言ったように、アライトクは追放者の仲間たちの世界だ。彼らは幸い、私に危害を加えることは望まない。この事実は私の希望に翼を与えてくれる。私の目を見ろ、シャイレンケイ。我々の同胞の苦しみを終わらせたいか？あなたの心の中に答えが見える。それを受け入れて、私を助けてくれないか」{n}ユリエットの言葉は同族に向けられたものだが、彼女はあなたの反応を注意深く見ている。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wie Ihr schon sagtet, Alaitoc ist eine Welt anderer Ausgestoßener. Sie würden nicht wünschen, dass mir etwas zustößt, und das verleiht meiner Hoffnung Flügel. Seht mir in die Augen, Shairenkhei. Möchtet Ihr das Leid unseres Volkes beenden? Ich kann die Antwort in Eurem Herzen sehen. Ihr müsst sie akzeptieren und mir helfen." {n}Auch wenn Yrliets Worte an ihren Verwandten gerichtet sind, beobachtet sie deine Reaktion ganz genau.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As you said, Alaitoc is a world of my fellow Outcasts. They would not wish harm upon me, which gives wings to my hope. Look me in the eye, Shairenkhei. Do you wish to end the suffering of our kin? I can see the answer in your heart. You must accept it and help me." {n}Though Yrliet's words are addressed to her kinsman, she is watching your reaction closely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr schon sagtet, Alaitoc ist eine Welt anderer Ausgestoßener. Sie werden mir nicht absichtlich schaden, und das verleiht meiner Hoffnung Flügel. Seht mir in die Augen, Shairenkhei. Möchtet Ihr das Leid unseres Volkes beenden? Ich kann die Antwort in Eurem Herzen sehen. Ihr müsst sie akzeptieren und mir helfen." {n}Auch wenn Yrliets Worte an ihren Verwandten gerichtet sind, beobachtet sie deine Reaktion ganz genau.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Senin de dediğin gibi Alaitoc, Yurtsuz dostlarımla dolu bir dünya. Bana bir zarar gelmesini istemezler. Bu da umudumu artırıyor. Shairenkhei, gözlerime bak. Soydaşlarımızın çektikleri acıları sonlandırmak istiyor musun? Yüreğinde yatan cevabı görebiliyorum. Bunu kabullenip bana yardım etmelisin." {n}Sözleri soydaşlarına yönelik olsa da Yrliet, senin tepkini yakından takip ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As you said, Alaitoc is a world of my fellow Outcasts. They would not wish harm upon me, which gives wings to my hope. Look me in the eye, Shairenkhei. Do you wish to end the suffering of our kin? I can see the answer in your heart. You must accept it and help me." {n}Though Yrliet's words are addressed to her kinsman, she is watching your reaction closely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Senin de dediğin gibi Alaitoc, Yurtsuz dostlarımla dolu bir dünya. Bana bir zarar gelmesini istemezler. Bu da umudumu artırıyor. Shairenkhei, gözlerime bak. Soydaşlarımızın çektikleri acıları sonlandırmak istiyor musun? Yüreğinde yatan cevabı görebiliyorum. Bunu kabullenip bana yardım etmelisin." {n}Yrliet'in sözleri, soydaşlarına yönelik olsa da senin tepkini yakında takip ediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
